lines.text: I feel like a turd in a punchbowl...
Hey! What you're gonna do to them with that ain't shit compared to what I'm gonna do to you with this.
Where did you get that piece Bear?
Got it for my nephew, 5 and dime
Damn! It's a couple of them Hell's Angels!
How would you like to have this pig right up your ass?
Pig up the ass... Two Hundred Fifty dollars!
You got 15 minutes because in 16 minutes I'm gonna have the maddest, meanest bunch of fuckers you ever saw in front of that fabrication plant.

[scratching his groind]
I ain't never had no scooter trash
Hey baby
[both freak out]
See soemthing ya like?
[both walk away]
...Guess not
Look at ALL those bikes.
Look at ALL those men.

[Bone rides away ]
I love that boy.
I do to

[to Melanie ]
Get Sprocket, tell'em to get me 20 of the meanest fuckers you can find and get ready to ride.
You mean that's it, I don't get to take Junior here out to play?
Nope
SHIT!
I ain't gonna let them build no pre-fabricated paradise and I ain't gonna let them kill them critters out there, FUCK THERE OFFER!
Leave me alone Blue Hogg, some things in this town are just not for sale.

[to Calvin Hogg ]
Why don't you cut the shit, I mean you know Ironbutt's got you up a tree.
Hey look don't get smart-ass with me cowboy.
Look Ironbutt, If I ain't back in an hour, you bring the bros and you let a bond fire for me and the Bear.

[looking up at Bear ]
Hey Bear, how they hangin' bro?
Little closer to the ground, just the way I like it
